evidence.claim: Honest Medical Group utilizes AWS for cloud services to ensure data security and compliance with HIPAA.
The company supports X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange in healthcare.
Honest Medical Group adheres to FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Real-time data integration patterns are implemented using cloud technologies mentioned in their documentation.

icp.icp_reason: Uses HIPAA X12 for claims and eligibility, aligning with API automation needs.
